summary: Introduced by Representative Biggs, H.R. 114, titled the 'Responsible Path to Full Obamacare Repeal Act,' proposes the complete repeal of the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (ACA) and the Health Care and Education Reconciliation Act of 2010. The repeal is scheduled to take effect on October 1, 2025. The bill stipulates that all laws amended or repealed by these acts would be restored to their original state, effectively reversing the legislative framework commonly known as 'Obamacare' and its associated reconciliation bill without proposing a replacement.
